author: _shemnon
content: Moving this discussion off of telegram and onto discord.

author: _shemnon
content: This room covers two orthogonal but related issues: how to set EIP and fork related parameters, and how to verify they are set correctly.  Long term this will also serve on bikeshedding which params for each fork need to be set and for client to verify.

author: _shemnon
content: But there are some prelimiaries.  First we need to determine which parametes to track, as well as keep an eye on future expansions. Also we should consider if we want to do this exercise for all prior forks or just for future forks, based off of the current config
